# bps: validations: timing-simulation

> continues [v1](./timing-simulation-v1.md).

## 3 nodes

```bash
@select bps-timing-simulation-$(@@timestamp)

@bps simulate timing upload .

@assets publish extensions=png,push .
```


mean overlap: 0.33

## 12 nodes

```bash
@select bps-timing-simulation-$(@@timestamp)

@bps simulate timing upload . \
    --nodes 12

@assets publish extensions=png,push .
```
